title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip-installable wrapper around the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLM or chat backends.

title: ollama-webui (open-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly ollama-webui) with chat history, RAG, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli (rust)
summary: Fast Rust CLI for pulling and chatting with Ollama models, built with tokio.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose stacks for CPU & GPU inference.

title: ollama-chatbot (Streamlit)
summary: Streamlit template that creates a ChatGPT-like UI backed by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for RAG, function-calling, fine-tuning and more with Ollama.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated Modelfile collection (Llama 3, Phi-3, Mixtral, etc.) with build scripts.

title: ollama-rag-connector
summary: Lightweight Python package to plug Ollama models into any vector-store for RAG.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers users via Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Bolt-based Slack bot that threads replies using any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted writing powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-rag-chat (Next.js)
summary: Full-stack Next.js app combining Ollama, ChromaDB and Tailwind for private RAG chat.
